source.568c6c01:
data_u = data[(data.passband == 'u')]
plt.figure(figsize = (20,20))
plt.subplot(221)
plt.scatter(data_u['tau_in'], data_u['tau_out'])
plt.xlabel('tau_in', fontsize = 15)
plt.ylabel('tau_out', fontsize = 15)
plt.ylim(ymax = 1500,ymin = -1)
plt.xlim(xmax = 1500, xmin = -1)
plt.title('DRW - tau with u band ', fontsize = 15)
plt.subplot(222)
plt.scatter(data_u['SF_in'], data_u['SF_out'])
plt.xlabel('SF_in', fontsize = 15)
plt.ylabel('SF_out', fontsize = 15)
plt.title('DRW - SF with u band ', fontsize = 15)
plt.show()

source.352af42f:
try:
    import corner
except:
    !pip install corner
    import corner
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
import matplotlib

modelpar = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/plasticc_modelpar_088_AGN.csv')
tau_sf = modelpar[['SFU','TAU']]
log_tau_sf = pd.concat([np.log(tau_sf['SFU']),np.log(tau_sf['TAU'])], axis = 1)

# plot hist2d
plt.figure(figsize = (10,10))
# corner.hist2d(np.array(log_tau_sf['SFU']),np.array(log_tau_sf['TAU']))
fig = corner.corner(log_tau_sf,labels = ['log(sf)','log(tau)'], show_titles=True, title_kwargs={"fontsize":10},label_kwargs = {'fontsize':14})

for ax in fig.get_axes():   
      ax.tick_params(axis='both', labelsize=14)
source.659249fc:
try:
    import corner
except:
    !pip install corner
    import corner
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
import matplotlib

# modelpar = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/plasticc_modelpar_088_AGN.csv')
data = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/drw_training_agn_redshift.csv')
for i in np.arange(2,12,1):
    data1 = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/drw_test_agn_redshift_'+str(i)+'.csv')
    data = pd.concat([data, data1], ignore_index = True)

data_u = data[data.passband == 'u']
tau_sf = data_u[['SF_out','tau_out']]
log_tau_sf = pd.concat([np.log(tau_sf['SF_out']),np.log(tau_sf['tau_out'])], axis = 1)

# plot hist2d
plt.figure(figsize = (10,10))
# corner.hist2d(np.array(log_tau_sf['SFU']),np.array(log_tau_sf['TAU']))
# fig = corner.corner(log_tau_sf,labels = ['log(sf_out)','log(tau_out)'], show_titles=True, title_kwargs={"fontsize":10},label_kwargs = {'fontsize':14})
fig = corner.corner(tau_sf,range = [(0,50),(1,750)],labels = ['sf_out','tau_out'], show_titles=True, title_kwargs={"fontsize":10},label_kwargs = {'fontsize':14})
for ax in fig.get_axes():   
      ax.tick_params(axis='both', labelsize=14)
source.7b825c3a:
try:
    import corner
except:
    !pip install corner
    import corner
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
import matplotlib

# modelpar = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/plasticc_modelpar_088_AGN.csv')
data = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/drw_training_agn.csv')
for i in np.arange(2,12,1):
    data1 = pd.read_csv('../input/drw-agn-parameter-dataset/drw_test_agn_'+str(i)+'.csv')
    data = pd.concat([data, data1], ignore_index = True)

data_u = data[data.passband == 'u']
tau_sf = data_u[['SF_out','tau_out']]
log_tau_sf = pd.concat([np.log(tau_sf['SF_out']),np.log(tau_sf['tau_out'])], axis = 1)

# plot hist2d
plt.figure(figsize = (10,10))
# corner.hist2d(np.array(log_tau_sf['SFU']),np.array(log_tau_sf['TAU']))
# fig = corner.corner(log_tau_sf,labels = ['log(sf_out)','log(tau_out)'], show_titles=True, title_kwargs={"fontsize":10},label_kwargs = {'fontsize':14})
fig = corner.corner(tau_sf,range = [(0,50),(1,750)],labels = ['sf_out','tau_out'], show_titles=True, title_kwargs={"fontsize":10},label_kwargs = {'fontsize':14})
for ax in fig.get_axes():   
      ax.tick_params(axis='both', labelsize=14)
